# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    lines = []
    
    for word in words
        if length(lines[end]) + length(word) + 1 <= text_width
            push!(lines[end], word)
            push!(lines[end], " ")
        else
            push!(lines, word)
            push!(lines, " ")
        end
    end
    
    return join(lines, "\n"))
end

example = wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")
println(example)
```

The example output will be:
```
This function will wrap
words into lines
```
